Title: Relates to limiting the power of the governor to make an executive order or otherwise direct an executive agency to take any action that contradicts state law; repealer
Summary: Relates to limiting the power of the governor to give an executive order or otherwise direct an executive agency to take any action that contradicts state law.
LawCode: Rpld ยง652 sub 6, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT limiting the power of the governor to give an executive order or otherwise direct an executive agency to take any action that contradicts state law; and to repeal certain provisions of the labor law relating thereto
